value.0: <StartAction>[You see before you an anchoring post for one of the small boats floating just off the nearby banks. Unfortunately, it seems the previous boat owner died before he could make an escape...]</Start>
<StartAction>[A sturdy rope lies attached to this post. You could try to toss it onto a nearby boat and possibly reel it in...]</Start>

<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> <StartAction>[Despite your best effort, you end up throwing the rope too far, snagging it on a rock beneath the surface of the water... It seems this escape route is now closed to you...]</Start>
<StartAction>[Success] [You manage to catch the edge of the boat with the rope, just well enough to bring it within stepping distance of the bank.]</Start>
Well, what do we have here? You know, <FirstName>, I believe I could snag this rope around that floating boat nearby, and perhaps secure us an easy ride to the Docks... Want me to give it a shot?
<StartAction>[Tarin shrugs his small shoulders.]</Start> Have it your way...

<StartAction>[Tarin takes the rope into his hands, squinting his little eyes at the boat before unerringly tossing it easily around the keel. Straining his small arms, Tarin manages to bring the boat to the nearby banks...]</Start>
Simple as can be, <FirstName>! I do believe this craft will make for a nice escape device for us!
<FirstName>, I believe I could hook this rope around that boat. It might offer us safe passage to the Docks nearby. Shall I give it a try?
As you wish, <FirstName>.
<StartAction>[Markius moves towards the rope, tossing it casually in the direction of the nearby boat...]</Start>
<StartAction>[Despite Markius's best effort, the rope becomes entangled in the rocks lying below the water's surface, and it appears there is no effective way to recover it...]</Start>
Curses! I suppose this route is now out of the question, <FirstName>... We'll have to find another path to the Docks...
<StartAction>[Just as you begin to give up hope that he will be able to reel it in, the rope catches on the end of the boat, and Markius slowly brings it to the bank...]</Start>
There we go, <FirstName>! I believe this boat will do quite nicely for getting us to the Docks...
<StartAction>[Do you wish to board the boat and land it at the Docks?]</Start>
<StartAction>[You quickly step inside the boat and paddle your way to the nearby docks...]</Start>
[The rope to this anchor has been snagged upon the rocks below the water's surface, and you may no longer recover it... You will have to find another path to the docks...]
<< Set NPC to talk always >>
<StartAction>[Leave the rope as it is.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Dexterity] [Attempt to loop the rope onto the end of the boat and reel it in.]</Start>
That's alright, Tarin...
If you think you can manage it, Tarin, go right ahead...
I'd rather you didn't, Markius.
Yes, Markius. Please give it a try.
<StartAction>[No.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Yes.]</Start>
